data.description: A unique perspective on the LDS Temples of Utah and their surrounding beauty from the air.

data.title: Eastern State Penitentiary (And Al Capone !) by Robert W. Darabos — Kickstarter
data.name: Robert W. Darabos
data.description: a photography portfolio project of Eastern State Penitentiary, America's first real prison (and home to criminals like Al Capone !)

data.title: Jewels of the Delta by Alysia Burton Steele, photojournalist — Kickstarter
data.name: Alysia Burton Steele, photojournalist
data.description: Rich stories & photos of everyday, strong Mississippi Delta church mothers who I call Jewels of the Delta. Help preserve their stories.

data.title: Ephemeral Reality by Nicholas Gregory — Kickstarter
data.name: Nicholas Gregory
data.description: After an involuntary artistic famine, I need to satisfy my hunger and use my photography gifts to create this Ephemeral Reality project

data.title: Theater Blues by Jonathon Miller — Kickstarter
data.name: Jonathon Miller
data.description: Paying homage to the old movie theaters using the cyanotype printing process.

data.title: Into Asia: a photo book and bilingual guide of explorations by Kaleena & Eduardo — Kickstarter
data.name: Kaleena & Eduardo
data.description: A couple, one photographer and one writer, travels to Southeast Asia to document their views into a photo book and bilingual guide.

data.title: Urban Warriors by Dustin Raye LeDrew — Kickstarter
data.name: Dustin Raye LeDrew
data.description: Urban agriculture has the potential to change the world. My mission is to educate communities of the power urban farming possess.

data.title: Flint Hills of Kansas from the air, a little known frontier by Mike Cordell — Kickstarter
data.name: Mike Cordell
data.description: The flint hills of Kansas are a scenic frontier, rife with an antiquated lifestyle.  Help capture it in photograph before it disappears

data.title: 2014 Fine Art Photography Calendar by Chun Ming Huang — Kickstarter
data.name: Chun Ming Huang
data.description: A new and completely revamped 2014, 13-month Fine Art Photography calendar. Photographed and designed by Chun Ming Huang!

data.title: Our Home and Landscape by Kyle Adams — Kickstarter
data.name: Kyle Adams
data.description: This is a vision for sharing the beauty around Dallas, Texas. Your perspective of a leaf or cloud will greatly change. I promise.

data.title: 1000 Days of Greenbelt Nature by Harold Anderson — Kickstarter
data.name: Harold Anderson
data.description: Presenting 1000 days in the lives of the inhabitants of the natural world in Greenbelt Maryland with images, sound and commentary.

data.title: "Once Upon A Time" Fine Art Photography Project by Deidra W Kerce — Kickstarter
data.name: Deidra W Kerce
data.description: Dream of fairy tales with this fine art photography project.

data.title: The Lens as Looking Glass by H.P.Hart — Kickstarter
data.name: H.P.Hart
data.description: A compendium of captures, from the street-raw to the whimsical, staged and serendipitous, that profiles the magic of ordinary days.

data.title: INSPIRATION: Portraits of Black Women Changing Our World by Lauri Lyons — Kickstarter
data.name: Lauri Lyons
data.description: A traveling photography exhibition showcasing portraits of 30 iconic Black women transforming American culture and society.

data.title: What does Uganda look like? by Karen Lightner — Kickstarter
data.name: Karen Lightner
data.description: Recovering from years of war and dictatorship - what does Uganda look like now? Majestic vistas, shoeless orphans - photos will tell.

data.title: Chaos Math + 10 trillion computations = Artistic Abstracts by David Pino — Kickstarter
data.name: David Pino
data.description: Receive a beautiful modern abstract art piece created from unique chaos mathematical formulas or just download the Hi-Res files.

data.title: Charting the forbidden Island of Niihau and Kauai by air by patrick  mcfeeley — Kickstarter
data.name: patrick  mcfeeley
data.description: help me Chart the forbidden Island of Niihau and NaPali coast of Kauai  Hawaii by helicopter .

data.title: Warm of Heart: A Visual Story of Rural Thailand by Anne Bannister — Kickstarter
data.name: Anne Bannister
data.description: A photo-mixed media exhibit to share the stories of the Thai children with whom I fell in love and reveal the heart of their community

data.title: "War is Only Half the Story, Volume 6"-- Photo Book by Sara Terry — Kickstarter
data.name: Sara Terry
data.description: The sixth volume of our annual book, featuring the photography of 2012 grant winner Andrew Lichtenstein and the four 2012 finalists.

data.title: Cruis'n USA Photo Tour by Ryan Mayle, Devon Jefferson and Legohead — Kickstarter
data.name: Ryan Mayle, Devon Jefferson and Legohead
data.description: Ryan, Devon and Lego are traveling across the United States, documenting their journey along the way and need your help!

data.title: The BlackLab - A Traditional and Digital Community Darkroom by Rob Park — Kickstarter
data.name: Rob Park
data.description: A new space for photographers, artists and amateurs to explore old & new methods of photographic printmaking.

data.title: The Steel Horse Project: adventure riding photography by Peter Miller — Kickstarter
data.name: Peter Miller
data.description: A year long collection of amazing adventure riding action shots around the US.

data.title: Wanderlust : A Photography Book by Janay Everett — Kickstarter
data.name: Janay Everett
data.description: Wanderlust is a Travel Photo Book project created by LA based artist, Janay Everett.

data.title: 50/365: America 2014 by Anson Kessinger & Rusty Bartlett — Kickstarter
data.name: Anson Kessinger & Rusty Bartlett
data.description: A photographic/documentary account of America in the year 2014. (Jan. 1 - Dec. 31) A new photo every day from one of the fifty states.

data.title: Kinetic Light: A Photography & Video Art Exhibit in L.A. by Stephen Belovarich — Kickstarter
data.name: Stephen Belovarich
data.description: Young artist experimenting with light in photography & video is debuting his latest abstract artwork at Gallery 381 in Los Angeles, CA

data.title: Daguerreotype & Ambrotype Inspired Mirror & Glass iPrints by Nathaniel Park — Kickstarter
data.name: Nathaniel Park
data.description: 19th-century photographic processes re-imagined for the 21st century.

data.title: TOWANDA: Collaborative Documentary Photography by Parsons Documentary Strategies Students — Kickstarter
data.name: Parsons Documentary Strategies Students
data.description: TOWANDA is a photographic investigation of the effects of the gas industry (fracking) on the town and residents of Towanda, PA .

data.title: The Best of The Bay: Photo Flip Book by Ray Woods — Kickstarter
data.name: Ray Woods
data.description: My goal is to capture the best of what Tampa Bay has to offer within one visually dynamic Photo Flip Book.

data.title: Fashion Throughout Time by Essence Latifah — Kickstarter
data.name: Essence Latifah
data.description: Fashion Throughout time is a photo book that tell the history and progression of American and European fashion.
